songs.title: Never Gonna Let This Go
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
When I was at my lowest
You picked me up
Told me that you'd never leave my side
When I was at my strongest
You stood by
Seeing me on top filled you with pride

[Pre-Chorus]
But when I started falling
Where did you go?
Needed you to save me
But you didn't show
No, you didn't show, no

[Chorus]
All those times you called me angel
You had me thinking that you were the one
But you left like I was the devil
And now I know you used me just for fun
Left me stranded, reaching from below
Guess I was just one stop along the road
Moved on so quickly, what a low blow
But just so you know...
I'm never gonna let this go

[Verse 2]
The pain, it made me stronger
It always does
And I'm not as naive as I once was
Picked myself off of the ground
All on my own
Climbing back up and I'll do it alone

[Pre-Chorus]
Cause when I started falling
Where did you go?
Don't need you to save me
Just need you to know
Oh, I just need you to know, oh

[Chorus]
All those times you called me angel
You had me thinking that you were the one
But you left like I was the devil
And now I know you used me just for fun
Left me stranded, reaching from below
Guess I was just one stop along the road
Moved on so quickly, what a low blow
But just so you know...
I'm never gonna let this go

[Post-Chorus]
I'm never gonna let this go!
Never gonna, never gonna...
I won't let this go, no

[Bridge]
All the pain from the past
It all came rushing back
The moment you walked out on me
I shut the door, setting you free
And that was the last time I'm letting you in
Cause I'm all I need
Yeah I'm all I need...

[Post-Bridge]
Burning bridges like I needed
Won't forget how you left me bleeding...

[Chorus]
All those times you called me angel
You had me thinking that you were the one
But you left like I was the devil
And now I know you used me just for fun
Left me stranded, reaching from below
Guess I was just one stop along the road
Moved on so quickly, what a low blow
But just so you know...

Yeah just so you know, oh
I'm never gonna let this go
